https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/tbFGduE9xasKVoTEj9RwLxx2NSI.jpg A French couple has been living in Lisbon for years, and they return to Paris for a friend's wedding. They announce to another friend they are having dinner with that they are going to split. A Perfect Couple
